content:
On the night of March 12, the Russians attacked the southern regions of the Droam-Kamikadze type Shahd-131/136 and a missile.

About thisreportDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

“Within 2.5 hours, the air defense units reflected a drone attack. 8 The goals were destroyed: 2 - in Kherson region, 4 - in the sky above the Mykolaiv region, 2 more left our operating area in the direction of Dnipropetrovsk, where they were also destroyed.
The hits are not allowed, ”the message reads.

Also during this attack, the enemy also launched the X-59 rocket from a tactical aviation aircraft, from the Black Sea water area in the direction of Odesa region.

The defense forces added that the air defense units destroyed the target over the sea.

As reported by the Army in Kupyansk occupierspulled offAircraft on a multi -storey building.
title: In the south of air defense at night she destroyed the enemy rocket X-59 and 8 ShahEDs
